name: Rename parameter (Calor)
prompt:
In Rename.calr, find the `Calculate` function (f001) and perform a find-and-replace: change every occurrence of `val` to `value`. The word `val` appears exactly 3 times in this function and ALL must be changed:

1. Line with §I{i32:val} - change val to value
2. Line with §S (== result (* val 2)) - change val to value  
3. Line with §R (* val 2) - change val to value

Do NOT change the function ID f001. After editing, the function should have §I{i32:value}, §S (== result (* value 2)), and §R (* value 2).
